name: Kazi Mahmudul Hasan
title: AI/ML Enthusiast | Computer Science Student
bio: AI/ML enthusiast with a strong foundation in Computer Science (3.95 CGPA) and hands-on experience in developing intelligent systems. I'm passionate about leveraging artificial intelligence and machine learning to automate workflows, enhance user experiences, and solve complex real-world problems.
description: Currently pursuing my B.Sc. in Computer Science & Engineering, I combine theoretical knowledge with practical application in data analysis, machine learning, and software development. My work spans from data visualization and statistical modeling to building AI-powered solutions that drive innovation.
